question: 1)If I have intercourse with my husband more than once in a night, is once ghusal sufficient in the morning. 2)If my milk goes to his mouth unintentionally then what is sharia ruling.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is sufficient to make one Ghusl after having intercourse many times. It
is, however, advisable to at least wash after each intercourse.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
